msItem.title: Table of contents
msItem.rubric: A Bok þeßi ero ritnar Sógurnar
msItem.incipit: 1. af landinu Óbrazili _ 2. - Flóres oc Blantzeflur 3. - Raudolfi oc sunom hanns 4. - Sỏrla enom Sterka 5. - herrauds oc Bỏsa Saga 6. - Salus oc Nícanor 7. - Damusta 8. - Alefleck Rigards syne

msItem.title: Um það töfraða land Obrazile
msItem.rubric: Söguþáttur um þad Hulda og Tófrada Land OBRAZILE. Sem Liggur vid NordurJrland, er aptur af mennskum mónnum fanst, og af Synum anaudum Leistist Anno 1674: og med hverium hætte þad til bar,
msItem.incipit: J mórg r hafa tru verdugir menn þost Siar eitt Land. ut j Siőnum, vid Jrland
msItem.explicit: enn þeim sem vel ut Riette til Aoorrarsæmóar og odaudlegs nafns,
msItem.finalRubric: og Endast med gődum oskum þttur þesse

msItem.title: Flóres saga og Blankiflúr
msItem.incipit: Felix hefur kongur heitid hann redi fyrir Alpes borg i spania.
msItem.explicit: endandi so sitt lif med sæmd og Sóma til guds þionustu giordar gefandi sig gudí med godum eptirdæmum.
msItem.colophon: Anno 1795 var þeßi saga ritud Thórsteirn Gislason 1795

msItem.title: Rauðúlfs þáttur
msItem.rubric: Sagann Af Raudólfe Bőnda og sonumm hanns
msItem.incipit: Madur hiet Rdólfur enn kona hans Ragnhilldur
msItem.explicit: ófridar von af knuti kongi i dannmork,
msItem.finalRubric: og endast Só þessi saga af Rdúlfi og sinum hans

msItem.title: Sörla saga sterka
msItem.incipit: J þann Tima þa halfdan kongur Brőnufostri ried Sviþiod setti hann Castor mag sinn yfir England og gaf honum hertoga Nafn
msItem.explicit: Hogne var kongr ifer loþiód Londum og bardez vid Hedenn Hiaranda son sem seger i Olafs kongs Triggva sonar sogu

msItem.title: Ein Litil Historía
msItem.incipit: Eirn greifi var til varts berg Anno 1673 hann kugade fátækann almúgi
msItem.explicit: þannenn verdugt straff firer sín gudlőstunar ord

msItem.title: Um Sækonur
msItem.incipit: J hollande nádest ein sæ kona sem var klædt med ólie
msItem.explicit: Plinius skrifar at Liking alls þeß sem a Lande sé finnist i sionumm

msItem.title: Bósa saga
msItem.incipit: Hringr hét kongur er rede firir Gtlande hann var son Gta kongs Odens sonar
msItem.explicit: er átte Sr Þorstein Ketels son prófast at Hrafnagile þeira dotter Helga hennar son Thorsteirn Gislason á Kroe_
msItem.finalRubric: Endast her svo Sagann af Herrde og Boosa

msItem.title: Sálus saga og Nikanórs
msItem.incipit: Tímo teus hefur kongr heitid hann redi fyrir Róma Riki
msItem.explicit: stirdu þeir fózbrædr Sínum Rikium til dauda dags med fremd oc pridi oc fengu ágiætt andlát,
msItem.finalRubric: oc líkr So þeßare Sógu af þeim Fóstbrædrum, Sluse kónge oc nicanor hertoga
msItem.note: 19 chapters. Between fols. 100 and 101 a slip of paper with a variant reading is inserted. Twice on fol. 108r the scribe left some space blank where numbers should be.

msItem.title: Dámusta saga
msItem.incipit: Catalagus hefur kongur heitid hann riedi fyrir Gricklande
msItem.explicit: voru so nær kirkiu, ad heira matti þangad kluckna hlíod,
msItem.finalRubric: og endast hier med þesse Saga af Damusta, mun hun endelega vera lógd ut ur grisku male

msItem.title: Ála flekks saga
msItem.rubric: Her biriast Sagann af ALEFLECK Rýgards Syne
msItem.incipit: Rýgard hefr kóngr heited; hann Rede fyrir Einglande; hann var son hálfdánar Brőnu Fostra
msItem.explicit: Sídann gifttest Hann og þotte vera ágiætr kóngr og mikill bæde at Vits munumm og Rikdómu Jokst ætt Hanns i Englandi

supportDesc.condition: The manuscript is in good condition, but the margins have been cut very close to the text, with some loss of text on fol. 25r (marginal note) and on fols. 113-114. On some pages the ink has faded, on others it runs.

layout.note: Fols. 1v and 12v,15v are blank. Written in brown ink in one column with 16 to 33 lines per page, although usually with 27 to 31 lines. New chapters begin with a chapter heading that is in the centre of an otherwise blank line. A different script is often used to indicate proper names, verses, direct speech and the first one or two lines of new chapters.

handDesc.handNote: Þorsteinn Gíslason used both hum cursiva and late kurrent script. Unclear whether it is the hreppstjóri and skáld from Stokkahlöðum, 1776-1838. The sprettskrift (hum cursiva) looks very similar to Þorsteinn's, but síðfljótaskrift (late current) looks different.

additions.p: Fol. 1r, right margin: Tech, and bottom: Bókina ä G H S G Gugm / G G G. Fol. 39v, bottom: her aftann vid ætti ad setiaz Sagann af Sigurdi þógula. Fol. 73v, left margin: þetta er satt. Fol. 91v, left margin: þeßi cap er ecke fullkomenn. Fol. 135r, right margin: Sig. Fol. 144v, left margin: Anno 1795. Fol. 150v: Cantumm ANo 1795.

binding.p: Wooden boards, covered with marbled paper, and brown leather at the corners and the spine, blue book block.

origin.note: According to a note on fol. 150v, the manuscript was written in 1795.

revisionDesc.change: Introduced repository auth file. Updated repository element pointing, adding @ref and removing @key.
Missing information added based on SVH's diss.
